text: The TPC Colorado Championship is a golf tournament on the Korn Ferry Tour. It was first played in July 2019 at TPC Colorado in Berthoud, Colorado. This was the first professional golf tournament played in Colorado since 2014. ==Winners== {|class=wikitable style=font-size:95% !Year!!Winner!!Country!!Score!!To par!!Margin of victory!!Runner-up |- | 2020 || Will Zalatoris || || align=center|273 || align=center|−15 || 1 stroke || Chase Johnson |- | 2019 || Nelson Ledesma || || align=center|273 || align=center|−15 || 1 stroke || Brett Coletta |} ==References== ==External links== * *Coverage on the Korn Ferry Tour's official site Category:Korn Ferry Tour events Category:Golf in Colorado Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2019 Category:2019 establishments in Colorado
title: TPC Colorado Championship
